titleStmt.title: The knitters jobb or The earnest suitor of Walton town to a fair maid, with her modest answers and conclusion of their intents : to the tune of Shackley hey.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the golden ball in West-Smithfield near the hospital gate,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "VVithin the town of Walton fair ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the golden ball in West-Smithfield near the hospital gate
